section_radius.label: Section default radius
section_radius.info: Used for section's outer and inner elements.

favicon_image.label: Favicon image
favicon_image.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

crncy_format.info: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

gift.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
gift.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

free_ship_msg.label: Free shipping bar text
free_ship_msg.info: Use ||amount|| to display progress towards free shipping.
free_ship_msg.help_para: Follow our steps to enable free shipping [More info](https://docs.1o1development.com/themes/Swanky/Free%20shipping%20bar).

min_spend.label: Minimum spend for free shipping
min_spend.info: Use round numbers. Exclude currency, symbols, and letters [More info](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/setting-up-shipping-rates#free-shipping-over-a-certain-value).

rel_prd_slideshow_max_count.label: Related collection max products to show

mobile.info_small: On extra small screens, two columns will merge into one for better display.

header.label: Shopify-hosted video
header.info: Shows when no image is selected.

header-embed.label: Or embed video from URL
header-embed.info: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

filters.label: Enable filters
filters.info: Customize filters with the Search & Discovery app [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/filters)

pagination.label: Pagination
pagination.info: Choose how additional pages are navigated.

interval.label: Change slides every
interval.info: This will only work if auto-play is enabled.

message.label: Message
message.info: This shows when the end date elapses and 'Show message' option is selected.

end_date.label: End date
end_date.info: The end date must be set to a future date and include the following format: YYYY/MM/DD.

custom_liquid.name: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

enable_admin_description.label: Show collection description from the admin instead

language.label: Enable language selector
language.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

country.label: Enable country/region selector
country.info: To add a country/region, go to your [market settings.](/admin/settings/markets)

rating.label: Show product rating
rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://docs.1o1development.com/themes/Swanky/Product%20Reviews%20App)

position.label: View layout
position.info: Will appear at bottom and full width in case of 'Horizontal slideshow'

size_chart.label: Show size chart
size_chart.info: Only shows when 'Size' option is added into variants.

dynamic.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
dynamic.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

gift.label: Show recipient form for gift card products
gift.info: When enabled, gift card products can optionally be sent to a recipient with a personal message.

message.label: Custom message
message.info: Use ||product_url|| to display the URL of the product.

complementary.name: Complementary products
complementary.content: To select complementary products, add the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

bundle.info: If Enabled, products will be shown to bottom.
bundle.label: Enable

show_top_footerbottom_border.label: Show top border on footer bottom

follow_on_shop.label: Enable Follow on shop
follow_on_shop.info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

show_social_list.label: Enable Social media links
show_social_list.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media).

show_social_list.label: Show social links
show_social_list.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your [theme settings](/editor?context=theme&category=social%20media)

settings.content: For best results, use an image with a 8:7 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

share.label: Enable share button
share.info: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images). A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

banner.name: Banner
banner.content: These settings will only apply to Desktop.

view_more_button.label: Enable "View all" if blog has more articles than shown

layout.label: Desktop menu layout
layout.info: Only works if there are multiple menu blocks

alt_text.label: Video alt text
alt_text.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

setting.info: Text can appear as a stencil outline. May not work in all browsers.

color_scheme.label: Menu drawer/ Mega menu color scheme

show_store_locator.label: Show store locator popup
show_store_locator.info: It will be hidden on mobile

top_header_border.top: Show top border of header top
top_header_border.bottom: Show bottom border of header top

bottom_header_border.bottom: Show bottom border of header bottom

item.label: Menu item position
item.info: To show the mega menu, identify the position of the menu item in your list and enter the corresponding number in the input field. For example, if the catalog item is the second in your menu, enter '2'.
To show the featured banner, match the index position with mega menu index number

message.label: Message
message.info: This shows when the end date elapses and 'Show message' option is selected.

end_date.label: End date
end_date.info: The end date must be set to a future date and include the following format: YYYY/MM/DD.

video.info: Shows when no image is selected.

embed_video.info: Shows when no Shopify-hosted video is selected.

v_alignment.info: Only applies when image is uploaded

alt_text.label: Video alt text
alt_text.info: Describe the video for customers using screen readers. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-features#video-block)

description_text.label: Display a customizable list of collections with accompanying images to represent each category.

section_media_order.info: Only works when scroll view is selected.

custom_image.label: Custom Image
custom_image.info: Upload an image to override the default collection image.

view_more.label: Enable "View all" if collection has more products than shown

description_text.label: Give customers details about the collection or content on the template

product_card.label: Product
product_card.info: It will only works when product is disabled
